app.name: Pingus Wii
app.long_description:
Guide penguins to safety in this 2D puzzle-strategy game - Based on v0.7.7 with various improvements & fixes - Originally ported by r-win and updated by DeltaResero - Features a story campaign & dozens of extra levels - Assign penguins roles to overcome hazardous obstacles - Supports Wii Remote, USB Keyboard & Mouse
For more info, visit: github.com/DeltaResero/pingus-wii
